backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining types for syllabus, GK, IQ, second/third paper content, exams, videos, notes, and user profiles; includes authorization mixin, storage for all content types, bookmark maps, and a comment system with user permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the removal of 'Add' buttons from all admin management forms (Syllabus, GK, IQ, Second Paper, Third Paper, Exams, Videos, Notes) with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including routing, content configuration, styling, hooks for bookmarks and authentication, pages for dashboard/subjects/exams/bookmarks, and UI components with Nepali translations and warm neutral backgrounds.
frontend/index.css: Global stylesheet with Tailwind directives, OKLCH color system variables for light/dark themes, and custom styling for borders and backgrounds.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, title for Tayari exam-preparation app, and script tag loading the React app from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component with TanStack Router configuration defining routes for dashboard, syllabus, subjects (GK, IQ, second/third paper topics), bookmarks, old questions, exams, offline library, and admin panel, wrapped in error boundary with 3-second splash screen.
frontend/src/components/admin/ExamManage: Admin interface to view and delete existing exams, displaying title, duration, description, and PDF URL.
frontend/src/components/admin/GKManageme: Admin interface with tabs to manage (view and delete) GK topics and videos separately.
frontend/src/components/admin/IQManageme: Admin interface with tabs to manage (view and delete) IQ categories and videos separately.
frontend/src/components/admin/SecondPape: Admin component with tabs to manage second paper topics, videos, and notes with delete functionality using the useSecondPaperManagement hook.
frontend/src/components/admin/Standalone: Admin component to display and delete standalone notes with confirmation dialogs and toast notifications.
Admin component to display and delete standalone videos with confirmation dialogs and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/admin/SyllabusMa: Admin component to manage syllabus entries, displaying title, description, drive URL, and published status with delete functionality.
frontend/src/components/admin/ThirdPaper: Admin component with tabs to manage third paper topics, videos, and notes with delete functionality using the useThirdPaperManagement hook.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Authentication and authorization guard component that checks user identity and admin status, displaying loading states, login prompts, or access denied messages before rendering protected admin content.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary class component that catches render errors, logs them with full stack traces, and displays a user-friendly fallback UI with error message and reload button.
frontend/src/components/AppLogo.tsx: Logo component displaying the 3D education globe PNG with automatic fallback to Thah Study logo on load error.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Authentication control button component that toggles between login and logout states, handles Internet Identity authentication, and clears query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar component with Home, Video, Notes, Exam tabs (and Admin for admins), using Nepali labels and highlighting the active route.
frontend/src/components/CourseImageCarou: Auto-advancing image carousel with manual navigation controls and dot indicators for course images.
frontend/src/components/DriveViewer.tsx: Embeds Google Drive files/folders with fallback to external link, includes offline save and download functionality.
frontend/src/components/SoundPlayer.tsx: Audio player component that plays an exam finish bell sound when triggered, with error handling.
frontend/src/components/TopicVideoList.t: Displays a scrollable list of videos grouped by topics with selection highlighting and bookmark toggle functionality.
frontend/src/components/YouTubePlayer.ts: Embeds YouTube videos or playlists by parsing various URL formats into iframe embed URLs.
frontend/src/content/exams.ts: Defines exam sets for three papers (first, second, third) with titles in Nepali, Google Drive URLs, durations, and coming soon flags.
frontend/src/content/gk.ts: Defines General Knowledge subject configuration with topics covering solar system, world/Nepal geography, world/Nepal history, social/economic aspects, and science/technology with associated video URLs.
frontend/src/content/iq.ts: Defines IQ test content configuration with 6 topics (Verification, Completion, Classification, Analogy, Filing Aptitude, Follow Instructions) and associated video links for each topic.
frontend/src/content/oldQuestions.ts: Contains old question paper data organized by first, second, and third papers with years (2078-2083) and Google Drive links, including province-specific papers.
frontend/src/content/secondPaper.ts: Exports two subject configurations: Office Management (कार्यालय व्यावस्थापन) and Constitution (संविधान), each with topics, video links, and notes URLs.
frontend/src/content/syllabus.ts: Exports syllabus links array containing Google Drive URLs for all syllabus parts and province-specific syllabi (Koshi, Madhesh, Bagmati, Gandaki, Lumbini, Karnali, Sudurpashchim).
frontend/src/content/thirdPaper.ts: Defines Service Management (सेवा व्यावस्थापन) subject configuration with 9 topics covering civil service, public service flow, governance acts, and related legislation with video links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, handles admin token initialization, and invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Custom hook managing video and note bookmarks with local storage persistence and cloud sync via backend actor when authenticated, merging local and server data.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdownTimer.ts: React hook providing countdown timer functionality with start, stop, reset controls and formatted time display, supporting optional completion callback.
frontend/src/hooks/useExamManagement.ts: React hook for managing mock exams with queries and mutations to fetch, add, and delete exam data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGKManagement.ts: React hook for managing General Knowledge topics and videos with CRUD operations through the backend actor and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useIQManagement.ts: React hook for managing IQ categories and videos with queries and mutations for adding and deleting content via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: React hook for managing user notifications stored in localStorage, with default notifications for updates and exams, and read/unread tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineLibrary.ts: React hook for managing offline library items (documents, videos, notes) stored in localStorage with add and remove functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React hook that queries the backend actor to check if the current caller has admin privileges.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecondPaperManagem: React hook for managing Second Paper content (topics, videos, notes) with comprehensive CRUD operations via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useStandaloneNoteMana: React hook for managing standalone notes with queries and mutations to fetch, add, and delete notes through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useStandaloneVideoMan: React hook for managing standalone videos with queries and mutations to fetch, add, and delete videos via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSyllabusManagement: React hook for managing syllabus entries with queries and mutations to fetch, add, and delete entries through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useThirdPaperManageme: Custom React hook that provides queries and mutations for managing third paper topics, videos, and notes using TanStack Query and an actor backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file with Tailwind directives, CSS custom properties for theming (light/dark mode), and keyframe animations for UI transitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin panel page with tabbed interface for managing syllabus, GK, IQ, second/third paper content, exams, videos, and notes, protected by AdminGuard.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying PSC exam preparation subjects organized by paper (first, second, third) with navigation cards, course carousel, and notification bell.
frontend/src/pages/Exam.tsx: Exam page with countdown timer, exam selection interface, and DriveViewer for displaying exam content with sound notification on completion.
frontend/src/pages/NotesBookmarks.tsx: Page displaying user's bookmarked notes with ability to remove bookmarks, showing empty state when no bookmarks exist.
frontend/src/pages/Notifications.tsx: Displays notifications grouped by category (updates and exams) with ability to mark as read. Uses a sticky header with back navigation and shows unread items with a badge.
frontend/src/pages/OfflineLibrary.tsx: Shows a list of offline-saved items (notes and question papers) with options to view or delete them. Displays an empty state when no items are saved.
frontend/src/pages/OldQuestions.tsx: Displays old exam questions organized in three tabs (first, second, third paper) with clickable cards that open a DriveViewer. Handles coming-soon states and missing URLs.
frontend/src/pages/SplashScreen.tsx: Animated splash screen with logo, app title in Nepali, and loading animation. Includes creator credit and prevents body scrolling while visible.
frontend/src/pages/SubjectContent.tsx: Main subject content page with resizable panels for videos and notes, video search functionality, and bookmark support. Provides both desktop (split-panel) and mobile (tabbed) layouts.
frontend/src/pages/Syllabus.tsx: Lists syllabus items as clickable cards that open a DriveViewer when selected. Handles coming-soon states and provides back navigation.
frontend/src/pages/VideoBookmarks.tsx: Displays bookmarked videos with search functionality and delete options. Shows empty state when no bookmarks exist and includes bottom navigation.
frontend/src/types/content.ts: TypeScript type definitions for content structure including Video, Topic, and SubjectConfig interfaces used throughout the app.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/src/utils/videoSearch.ts: Provides a function to filter topics and videos by keyword search, returning only topics with matching titles or videos.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking a feature request to remove 'Add' buttons from admin panel management forms across multiple sections (Syllabus, GK, IQ, Papers, Exams, Videos, Notes).
